title: Investigate Bridge Structural Health Alert
description: Sensors on a major bridge have detected abnormal stress levels after a minor earthquake.

tasks.description: Acknowledge a 'High Stress' alert from the 'Central Bridge' monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the critical alert for the bridge.

tasks.description: Analyze the sensor data to pinpoint which part of the structure is showing the highest stress.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the stress is on a specific support pillar.

tasks.description: Dispatch a structural engineering team to perform an emergency inspection and temporarily reduce the bridge's speed limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order for inspection and updates the traffic management system.
